content: the fellowship of the ring hat using size us 4/3 5mm circular needles and scrap yarn provisionally cast on 112 stitches join in the round and knit 3-4 in/8-10 cm of twisted rib remove provisional cast on placing live stitches onto second circular needle of any length with us 4/3 5mm or smaller needles knit cast on stitches and top of brim stitches together one at a time creating folded brim switch to us 6/4mm needles and knit 1 round in main color join contrast color and knit row 1-19 of chart switch to us 5/3 75mm needles break contrast color yarn and knit main color in stockinette until hat measures 7-8 in/17-20 cm from bottom of folded brim decreases round 1 k6 k2tog repeat to end round 2 k5 k2tog repeat to end round 3 k4 k2tog repeat to end round 4 k3 k2tog repeat to end round 5 k2 k2tog repeat to end round 6 k1 k2tog repeat to end round 7 k2tog repeat to end break yarn and thread through remaining live stitches with darning needle and pull tight weave in ends block to preference
